Reviews.Content: Fine place This place is like-new, rooms very nice tho some hallway noise intrudes. Bed was great. Thermostats in room distinguish this from many other NYC hotels. Had fine view of Empire State Bldg and Macy's flagship store. Staff very accommodating. Parking across the street for $30/night w/hotel discount, a good deal for NY. Subway entrance (34th/Herald Square) is about 50 feet from front door.
Reviews.Author: WSmile5

Reviews.Content: A great bargain but location ?? We just stayed four nights at this hotel. We had a great rate of about $200/night per room (we had 2 rooms 1 with 2 queens and 1 with a king)The rooms are small but adequate. I am sure there are much smaller rooms in NYC No fridge or microwave unlike most Hampton Inn's. Flat screen tv. Breakfast again not as many choices as other out of the city Hampton Inns. Very very small bathrooms.Staff very helpful and pleasant. Rooms clean although we came back one day around 5pm and room still not cleaned. However it was thendone quickly.Location- great for getting around. Subway mere steps from hotel. Macey's the same. I will say the choice of restaurants was fairly limited within short walking distance.For the price we would stay there again
Reviews.Author: momtoemma

Reviews.Content: Great hotel and staff My wife, daughter and I have just returned from our first trip to New York and absolutely loved it!The Hampton Inn was perfect. The room was great, location ideal and all the staff helpful and very friendly. A special mention for Carlos who worked so hard but always had time for a friendly chat.This hotel will be our first choice when we return to the city.
Reviews.Author: madgeandco

Reviews.Content: This Is A Brand New Hotel       12/08
Reviews.Author: lwoods2

Reviews.Content: Nice, new hotel with great service!       The desk and TV were very nice! (And we had free Wi-fi too!)
Reviews.Author: NAUgrad05

Reviews.Content: Great location, wonderful staff, clean, free breakfast, great deal Stayed in room 1401 the night of 12/11/08. Great view of the huge Christmas tree decoration in front of Macy's Herald Square. The room has 2 double beds, flat screen TV, small but adequate bathroom and was clean, clean, clean. The staff was so friendly. Free breakfast, with coffee, tea and hot chocolate available at all times. I was on a business trip, so I was not paying for the room, but $329 a night for midtown at Christmas time was a great deal.
Reviews.Author: CarolAnnBrynMawr

Reviews.Content: Good Value! Excellent value - Hampton Inn has great weekend rates. The location is half a block from a subway station, one block to Macy's, and three blocks to Madision Square Garden. The room -we had two double beds - is small, as is the bathroom, but perfectly fine for New York city where space is at a premium. The male staff are very friendly. Rooms come with breakfast. There is coffee, tea, hot chocolate available all day. Nice - when coming in from the cold. I love Hampton's white duvet covers and extra pillows.
Reviews.Author: ChristmasSJ

Reviews.Content: Reasonably priced alternative in Manhattan Hampton Inns generally provide a good value, wherever they are located, but this Hampton offers a reasonably-priced room, in a very expensive city. Like all Hampton Inns, the services are limited, and the rooms are simple, but the staff are very friendly, and the rooms are clean, as are the common areas of the hotel. The location is also very good, as it is easily walkable to Times Square and Broadway (10 - 15 minutes). All-in-all, if you simply need a place to stay while you explore the city, and you don't plan to spend a lot of time in the hotel (so you don't need all the amenities of a full-service hotel), this may be your best option, and it is priced right.
Reviews.Author: Spyderwood

Reviews.Content: 'fantastic' after staying in the quality inn brooklyn this hotel was pure heaven.service and friendliness was spot on. location couldnt have been better.the beds were a dream to sleep in, very clean and comfortable.all the facilities in the room were great and i would stay in this hotel if i was to come back to ny again (which i will!)two brilliant irish bars on the same block.
Reviews.Author: macyYorkshire

Reviews.Content: Not your typical Hampton Inn!       Room
Reviews.Author: andrew23

Reviews.Content: Best ever Hampton Inn Just back from the best trip. Hampton Inn fantastic, brand new hotel, situated in the middle of everything, fabulous pubs, restaurants outside the door, Macys and Empire State could be seen from our room window, and only a minute stroll away. Brian gave us a fabulous welcome and all the staff from the breakfast (which was a fabulous and free addition) staff through to the bell hops and concierge couldn't have done enough for us. The beds are so comfy, nice sized room, fabulous shower no shortage of hot water,flat screen t.v. with all channells and free Internet access. Fitness and business centre and local calls free. Who could ask for anything more. Thanks to the Hampton, We'l be back.The Twomey Family, Cork, Ireland.
Reviews.Author: ennaCork

Reviews.Author: Vero397
